attributes.action: be more environmentally aware in everything he does eg new policies, personal lifestyle, foreign policies etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: sign here to hopefully influence the government to be more environmentally friendly in everything they do; to implement better thought out and more feasable environmentally friendly policies. to better promote environmental issues and theories to everyone, at home and abroad. to lead by exapmle by driving through policies that  will actually make a difference. you get the idea.......

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
